summary: WHILE ACCELERATING ON HIGHWAY, ENGINE AND OIL LIGHT CAME ON; ENGINE BEGAN MAKING KNOCKING NOISE.  PULLED CAR OVER.  FORD DEALERSHIP STATED ENGINE FAILURE DUE TO INPROPER MAINTENANCE.  OIL CHANGED ACCORDING TO MAINTENANCE SCHEDULE -- DO NOT HAVE EVIDENCE BECAUSE IT WAS DONE BY HUSBAND. VEHICLE ONLY HAS 60K MILES.
